document.full_text: the parents of a disney cruise line employee who disappeared during a voyage off mexico last week met with investigators on sunday seeking answers to their daughter's fate after the ship returned to its home port in los angeles.
document.title: missing cruise ship worker's parents seek answers
lines_and_colors: the parents of a disney cruise line employee who disappeared during a voyage off mexico last week met with investigators on sunday seeking answers to their daughter's fate after the ship returned to its home port in los angeles.
